title: Lookup Customer Profile
description: Look up existing customer by phone and address

function.name: lookup_customer_profile
function.description: Look up an existing customer profile by phone (address optional). Use in two cases: (1) At call start — call with just the caller's phone to try to greet by name if returning customer; (2) After customer says yes to warranty question — call with phone and address to confirm profile. Use returned name and partner_id for the rest of the call.

address.description: Service address to help match the correct profile
